ground_truth: JAY deals with a customer as SILENT BOB looks on, and the two exit. DANTE, alone, studies his summons and rubs his forehead, then spins angrily before his expression softens. DANTE hops behind the counter as a customer pays for something while he continues to talk. Another customer and then yet another approach the counter. JAY and SILENT BOB lean against the wall as a woman kisses DANTE's forehead and walks away, heading toward the back. DANTE watches her leave, then looks ahead dreamily, half-spinning in his chair before exploding in jubilance. RANDAL enters carrying videos, and DANTE hands him the summons, which RANDAL reads. The cooler door is heard opening as DANTE and RANDAL regard a woman curiously; she looks very satisfied. CAITLIN walks lazily down the convenience store aisle, and DANTE is bewildered as she joins them, latching onto DANTE's arm lovingly. RANDAL and DANTE stare at CAITLIN, confused, and everyone is silent. The same OLD MAN who took a porn mag to the bathroom is now serene, almost happy, as he lies on a stretcher. The body bag zipper is pulled closed as DANTE, the CORONER, and RANDAL stand around the stretcher-bound body bag. Midway down the body bag, something protrudes, pushing it up, indicating an erection. The CORONER takes notes while RANDAL stares at it. Ambulance attendants join them, and the stretcher is wheeled out. The CORONER stares at DANTE, while RANDAL and the CORONER stare in disbelief. RANDAL looks down, anonymously, and DANTE and RANDAL stare at the floor, both saying nothing. RANDAL hops off the freezer case and exits, later returning as DANTE crosses out of the scene. DANTE repairs ripped dollar bills by taping them back together. JAY enters with SILENT BOB and claps his hands, then exits, leaving SILENT BOB standing there until he also leaves. DANTE shuts his eyes tightly and rubs the bridge of his nose with his thumb and forefinger in deep concentration, then suddenly snaps his eyes open. RANDAL has a heart-to-heart with VERONICA, who stares dumbfounded before exiting. DANTE lies alone on the floor as RANDAL exits and locks the door behind him. Close-up on RANDAL's face as he steps inside, hands clasp around his throat, and DANTE yanks him out of the frame, throttling RANDAL and choking him to the ground. RANDAL throws his fists into DANTE's midriff, sending him back into the magazine rack. RANDAL jumps to his feet as DANTE comes at him again, causing RANDAL to tumble into cakes as Entenmann's products scatter around him. He grabs a pound cake and hits DANTE in the head with it, using the opportunity to scurry down the middle aisle. RANDAL grabs Italian bread and smacks it into DANTE's face as DANTE rushes him blindly.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: JAY handles a patron as SILENT BOB observes, and the duo depart. DANTE, solitary, examines his summons and massages his brow, then whirls furiously before his demeanor softens. DANTE leaps behind the counter as a patron settles for something while he continues to converse. Another patron and then yet another approach the counter. JAY and SILENT BOB recline against the partition as a woman pecks DANTE's forehead and strolls away, heading toward the rear. DANTE observes her departure, then gazes forward dreamily, half-whirling in his seat before erupting in joy. RANDAL enters bearing videos, and DANTE hands him the summons, which RANDAL examines. The cooler door is audible opening as DANTE and RANDAL regard a woman curiously; she appears very contented. CAITLIN ambles languidly down the convenience store aisle, and DANTE is mystified as she joins them, clinging onto DANTE's arm affectionately. RANDAL and DANTE gaze at CAITLIN, puzzled, and everyone is silent. The same OLD MAN who took an adult magazine to the lavatory is now tranquil, almost content, as he reclines on a stretcher. The body bag zipper is pulled shut as DANTE, the CORONER, and RANDAL stand around the stretcher-bound body bag. Partway down the body bag, something protrudes, elevating it, indicating an erection. The CORONER jots notes while RANDAL stares at it. Ambulance staff join them, and the stretcher is wheeled away. The CORONER stares at DANTE, while RANDAL and the CORONER stare in disbelief. RANDAL gazes down, anonymously, and DANTE and RANDAL stare at the floor, both saying nothing. RANDAL jumps off the freezer case and leaves, later returning as DANTE crosses out of the scene. DANTE mends torn dollar bills by taping them back together. JAY enters with SILENT BOB and claps his hands, then exits, leaving SILENT BOB standing there until he also departs. DANTE closes his eyes tightly and massages the bridge of his nose with his thumb and forefinger in deep focus, then suddenly snaps his eyes open. RANDAL has a heart-to-heart with VERONICA, who stares dumbfounded before departing. DANTE lies solitary on the floor as RANDAL leaves and latches the door behind him. Close-up on RANDAL's face as he steps inside, hands clasp around his neck, and DANTE yanks him out of the frame, throttling RANDAL and choking him to the floor. RANDAL hurls his fists into DANTE's abdomen, sending him back into the periodical rack. RANDAL jumps to his feet as DANTE comes at him again, causing RANDAL to tumble into pastries as Entenmann's products scatter around him. He grabs a pound cake and strikes DANTE on the head with it, using the opportunity to scurry down the central aisle. RANDAL snatches Italian bread and smacks it into DANTE's face as DANTE rushes him blindly.

Tightly, DANTE's eyes are shut by him, and the bridge of his nose is rubbed with his thumb and forefinger in deep concentration, then his eyes are suddenly snapped open. A heart-to-heart is had by RANDAL with VERONICA, who is stared at dumbfounded before exiting. The floor is lied on alone by DANTE as the exit and door locking are done by RANDAL. DANTE's midriff is thrown into by RANDAL's fists, sending him back into the magazine rack. To his feet, RANDAL jumps as DANTE comes at him again, causing him to tumble into cakes as Entenmann's products are scattered around by him. He hops behind the counter as a customer pays, and continues talking. Two more customers approach. JAY and SILENT BOB lean against the wall as a woman kisses DANTE's forehead and leaves. DANTE watches, then spins in his chair before jubilantly reacting. RANDAL enters with videos; DANTE hands him the summons, which RANDAL reads. The cooler door opens as DANTE and RANDAL curiously watch a content woman. CAITLIN saunters down the aisle, latches onto DANTE’s arm, confusing him. They silently stare at CAITLIN. The OLD MAN from the bathroom is serene on a stretcher. The body bag is zipped, revealing a protruding erection. The CORONER notes while RANDAL stares. Ambulance attendants wheel the stretcher out. The CORONER and RANDAL stare at DANTE, bewildered. RANDAL exits and returns as DANTE tapes ripped dollar bills. JAY enters with SILENT BOB, claps, and leaves. DANTE shuts his eyes, rubs his nose in concentration, then snaps his eyes open. RANDAL has a heart-to-heart with VERONICA, who exits dumbfounded. DANTE lies on the floor as RANDAL exits, locking the door. RANDAL reenters, DANTE yanks, throttles, and chokes him. RANDAL fists DANTE’s midriff, sending him into a magazine rack. RANDAL stands, DANTE charges, and RANDAL tumbles into cakes. He hits DANTE with a pound cake, escapes down the aisle, and smacks DANTE’s face with Italian bread.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
JAY is engaged in dealing with a customer as SILENT BOB silently observes the exchange, and together, they both eventually make their way out of the scene. Left on his own, DANTE examines the legal summons he has received, feeling the stress as he massages his forehead. He then spins around in a moment of frustration but soon allows his tense expression to soften. Swiftly moving behind the counter, DANTE attends to a customer as they pay for their items, all the while continuing his conversation. As he manages this transaction, another customer approaches, followed by yet another person seeking assistance at the counter.

Meanwhile, JAY and SILENT BOB are seen leaning nonchalantly against the nearby wall. As a woman approaches, she leans in to plant a gentle kiss on DANTE's forehead before departing, making her way toward the back area. DANTE follows her departure with his eyes, gazing after her with a mixture of longing and admiration, then spins half-around in his chair in a dreamy state, only to suddenly burst into celebration. RANDAL makes an entrance carrying a stack of videos in his arms, and DANTE hands him the summons, which RANDAL begins to read over with interest. The sound of the cooler door being opened draws their attention, and DANTE and RANDAL turn to regard a woman who wears an expression of complete satisfaction. 

CAITLIN saunters lazily down the aisle of the convenience store, surprising DANTE with her presence as she joins them and affectionately links her arm with his. Both RANDAL and DANTE regard CAITLIN with bewilderment, and the scene falls silent as they all stand there. Nearby, the OLD MAN, who had previously taken a pornographic magazine into the bathroom, now appears calm and strangely content as he lies motionless on a stretcher. The zipper of the body bag is pulled closed, concealing the OLD MAN as DANTE, the CORONER, and RANDAL gather around the stretcher. Partway along the body bag, something protrudes, creating a noticeable bulge that suggests an erection. The CORONER diligently takes notes while RANDAL stares at the unusual scene with wide eyes. Ambulance attendants arrive to join the group, and together, they begin to wheel the stretcher out. The CORONER shifts his gaze to DANTE, while both RANDAL and the CORONER remain in a state of disbelief, staring silently. 

In response, RANDAL lowers his eyes, keeping a low profile, and both he and DANTE find themselves looking down at the floor, saying nothing. RANDAL hops off the freezer case and makes his way out, only to return later as DANTE exits the frame. DANTE carefully mends ripped dollar bills, using tape to patch them back together. JAY enters once more with SILENT BOB, clapping his hands before making his exit, leaving SILENT BOB to stand alone for a moment before he, too, departs. DANTE closes his eyes tightly, rubbing the bridge of his nose between his thumb and forefinger in a moment of deep thought, before abruptly snapping his eyes open wide. Meanwhile, RANDAL engages in a heartfelt conversation with VERONICA, who stands transfixed and speechless before eventually leaving. 

DANTE remains lying alone on the floor after RANDAL departs, ensuring the door is locked behind him. A close-up focuses on RANDAL's face as he steps inside, only to be met by DANTE's hands clasping around his throat, pulling RANDAL abruptly out of the frame as DANTE chokes him, forcing him to the ground. In retaliation, RANDAL throws his fists into DANTE's midsection, causing DANTE to reel back into the magazine rack. RANDAL quickly jumps to his feet as DANTE barrels toward him again, sending RANDAL tumbling into a display of cakes, scattering Entenmann's products in all directions. Seizing a pound cake in hand, RANDAL strikes DANTE on the head with it, taking advantage of the moment to escape down the middle aisle. Rushing blindly, DANTE charges, and RANDAL grabs a loaf of Italian bread, smacking it into DANTE's face in defense.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
JAY, deeply absorbed in the act of dealing with a customer, is accompanied by SILENT BOB, who quietly observes the interaction with attentive curiosity. Together, after a period of engagement, they both eventually make their way out of the scene in a seamless departure. Left to his own devices, DANTE intently examines the legal summons he has received, feeling the mounting stress as he massages his forehead in an attempt to alleviate the tension. In a moment of frustration, he spins around, but soon, his tense expression softens. Moving swiftly behind the counter, DANTE dutifully attends to a customer as they proceed to pay for their selected items, all the while maintaining a lively conversation. As he efficiently manages this transaction, another customer approaches, closely followed by yet another individual seeking assistance at the counter, creating a continuous flow.

Meanwhile, JAY and SILENT BOB recline nonchalantly against the nearby wall with a relaxed demeanor. As a woman approaches the scene, she leans in closer to plant a gentle kiss on DANTE's forehead before departing gracefully, making her way toward the back area. DANTE's eyes follow her departure with a gaze filled with a mixture of longing and admiration. He spins half-around in his chair, caught in a dreamy state, and then suddenly bursts into a celebratory mood. RANDAL makes a dynamic entrance, carrying a cumbersome stack of videos in his arms, and DANTE promptly hands him the summons, which RANDAL begins to read over with marked interest. The sound of the cooler door being opened momentarily diverts their attention, prompting a unified glance toward a woman who wears an unmistakable expression of complete satisfaction.

CAITLIN saunters lazily down the convenience store aisle, surprising DANTE with her unexpected presence as she joins them, affectionately linking her arm with his. Both RANDAL and DANTE look at CAITLIN with bewilderment, and the scene lapses into a quiet stillness as they all stand there, absorbing the moment. Nearby, the OLD MAN, who had earlier taken a pornographic magazine into the bathroom, now appears calm and decidedly content, lying motionless on a stretcher. The zipper of the body bag is slowly pulled closed, concealing the OLD MAN as DANTE, the CORONER, and RANDAL gather around the stretcher in mutual contemplation. Partway along the body bag, something protrudes conspicuously, creating a bulge that suggests an erection. The CORONER diligently takes notes, jotting down observations, while RANDAL stares at the unusual scene, wide-eyed with disbelief. Ambulance attendants arrive to join the group, and together, they begin to wheel the stretcher out. The CORONER shifts his gaze to focus on DANTE, while both RANDAL and the CORONER remain in a state of disbelief, silently staring.

In response to the unfolding scene, RANDAL lowers his eyes, opting to maintain a low profile, as he and DANTE find themselves looking down at the floor, maintaining a solemn silence. RANDAL hops off the freezer case and exits, only to return later as DANTE steps out of the frame. DANTE carefully mends ripped dollar bills, using tape to patch them back together meticulously. JAY re-enters with SILENT BOB, clapping his hands in a brief gesture of enthusiasm before making his exit, leaving SILENT BOB to stand alone momentarily before he, too, departs. DANTE closes his eyes tightly, rubbing the bridge of his nose between his thumb and forefinger in deep thought, before abruptly snapping his eyes open wide in a sudden moment of clarity. Meanwhile, RANDAL engages in a heartfelt conversation with VERONICA, who stands transfixed and speechless, absorbing his words before eventually departing.

DANTE remains lying alone on the floor after RANDAL departs, ensuring that the door is securely locked behind him. A close-up focuses intently on RANDAL's face as he steps inside, only to be met by DANTE’s hands clasping around his throat, pulling RANDAL suddenly out of the frame as DANTE chokes him, forcing him to the ground. In swift retaliation, RANDAL throws his fists into DANTE's midsection, causing DANTE to reel back into the magazine rack with a thud. RANDAL quickly jumps to his feet as DANTE barrels toward him again, sending RANDAL tumbling into a display of cakes, scattering Entenmann's products in all directions. Seizing a pound cake in hand, RANDAL strikes DANTE on the head with it, taking advantage of the moment to make a hasty escape down the middle aisle. Rushing blindly, DANTE charges forward, and RANDAL grabs a loaf of Italian bread, smacking it into DANTE's face in self-defense.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: JAY is engaged in a transaction with a customer while SILENT BOB observes the interaction silently, then both JAY and SILENT BOB make their way out of the scene. Alone in the space, DANTE takes a moment to focus on the summons in his hand, rubbing his forehead in a gesture of stress. He suddenly spins around in frustration but then visibly relaxes as his expression softens. With renewed energy, DANTE hops behind the counter to assist a customer who is paying for an item, continuing to engage them in conversation. As the transaction concludes, another customer approaches, followed shortly by yet another, keeping him occupied. Meanwhile, JAY and SILENT BOB position themselves against a nearby wall as a woman approaches DANTE, offering a gentle kiss on his forehead before she turns to walk away towards the back. DANTE's gaze follows her departure, and he looks straight ahead with a dreamy expression, allowing himself a half-spin in his chair before bursting into a moment of jubilant excitement. The scene shifts as RANDAL enters, carrying a stack of videos in his arms. DANTE dutifully hands over the summons to RANDAL, who begins to read it with interest. The sound of the cooler door opening captures their attention, leading DANTE and RANDAL to curiously regard a woman who appears very satisfied. Along the convenience store aisle, CAITLIN makes her way leisurely, and DANTE is left bewildered when she joins them, affectionately clutching onto his arm. Both RANDAL and DANTE are taken aback, casting confused glances at CAITLIN as a moment of silence envelops them. Nearby, the OLD MAN who previously borrowed a pornographic magazine for the bathroom now lies serenely on a stretcher, a subtle smile of contentment on his face. As the zipper of the body bag is drawn close, DANTE, the CORONER, and RANDAL gather around the stretcher-bound body bag. Midway through the bag, an unexpected protrusion signals an erection, catching the attention of all present. The CORONER meticulously jots down notes while RANDAL fixates on the area, and as ambulance attendants arrive, they efficiently wheel the stretcher away. The CORONER's gaze shifts to DANTE, while both he and RANDAL share a look of incredulity. RANDAL chooses a moment of anonymous contemplation, diverting his eyes downward, while both DANTE and RANDAL stand silently, their eyes fixed on the floor. Soon after, RANDAL hops off the freezer case, makes his exit, and re-enters the scene as DANTE departs. DANTE takes on the task of repairing torn dollar bills with precise tape application. JAY bursts in with SILENT BOB, clapping his hands with enthusiasm before leaving SILENT BOB alone, who shortly exits as well. In a moment of intense focus, DANTE squeezes his eyes shut and massages the bridge of his nose with his thumb and forefinger, deeply concentrating before abruptly reopening his eyes. RANDAL engages VERONICA in an earnest conversation, leaving her staring in disbelief before she exits. In solitude, DANTE lies on the floor, and as RANDAL exits, he ensures the door is locked behind him. The camera captures a close-up of RANDAL's face as he re-enters, his hands finding their way around his throat in surprise as DANTE seizes him, pulling him out of view and pressing RANDAL to the ground in a chokehold. RANDAL retaliates by landing punches on DANTE's midsection, causing him to stagger back into a display of magazines. Recovering quickly, RANDAL springs to his feet just as DANTE charges at him once more, resulting in RANDAL's fall into a display of cakes, which scatter around him. Seizing a pound cake, RANDAL strikes DANTE on the head, creating a momentary advantage to escape down the middle aisle. In a desperate move, RANDAL grabs a loaf of Italian bread and uses it to smack DANTE in the face as DANTE barrels towards him, vision obscured by the previous blow.

test_cases.description: JAY deals with a customer while SILENT BOB observes, and then both exit. Alone, DANTE contemplates his summons, expresses frustration, and then softens. He manages the counter as customers approach, engaging in conversation. JAY and SILENT BOB lean against the wall watching. They struggle, with RANDAL retaliating and knocking DANTE into a magazine rack, before hitting him with a pound cake and fleeing. RANDAL grabs Italian bread to fend off DANTE, who charges blindly.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: As JAY deals with a customer in the small neighborhood convenience store known for attracting eclectic locals, SILENT BOB, who is known for his stoic demeanor and love for comic books, looks on, and the two exit after wrapping up their informal exchange. DANTE, now alone, studies his court summons, a notice for his upcoming legal obligation, and rubs his forehead, visibly stressed. However, his anger dissipates as he spins before his expression softens. DANTE hops behind the counter, the central point of the store's transactions, as a regular customer pays for something while he engages them in conversation. Another customer and then yet another approach the counter, keeping him busy. JAY and SILENT BOB, notorious for their loitering near stores, lean against the wall as a woman, DANTE's longtime friend who often provides him with emotional support, kisses DANTE's forehead and walks away, heading toward the back storage area. DANTE watches her leave, then looks ahead dreamily, half-spinning in his chair before exploding in jubilance, perhaps uplifted by the encounter. RANDAL enters carrying a stack of videos, a typical delivery from his job at the local video rental store, and DANTE hands him the summons, which RANDAL reads with a frown. The cooler door is heard opening, a common sound in the store, as DANTE and RANDAL regard a woman curiously; she looks very satisfied, as if she found something she was seeking. CAITLIN, DANTE's high school sweetheart who brings a complicated history, walks lazily down the convenience store aisle, and DANTE is bewildered as she joins them, latching onto DANTE's arm lovingly. RANDAL and DANTE stare at CAITLIN, confused by her sudden intimacy, and everyone is silent. The same OLD MAN who earlier took a porn mag to the bathroom, seeking some private time, is now serene, almost happy, as he lies on a stretcher, having passed away in the store. The body bag zipper is pulled closed as DANTE, accompanied by the CORONER who annotates the scene, and RANDAL stand around the stretcher-bound body bag. Midway down the body bag, something protrudes, pushing it up, indicating an erection—a curious detail in the coroner's notes. Ambulance attendants, well-practiced in discreet removals, join them, and the stretcher is wheeled out, leaving a heavy silence. The CORONER stares at DANTE, while RANDAL and the CORONER share a look of disbelief over the unusual events. RANDAL looks down, anonymously avoiding eye contact, and DANTE and RANDAL stare at the floor, both saying nothing. RANDAL hops off the freezer case, an informal perch, and exits, later returning as DANTE crosses out of the scene. DANTE repairs ripped dollar bills, a common task for cashiers dealing with less-than-mint currency, by taping them back together. JAY enters with SILENT BOB and claps his hands, announcing their presence, then exits, leaving SILENT BOB standing there until he also leaves without a word. DANTE shuts his eyes tightly and rubs the bridge of his nose with his thumb and forefinger in deep concentration, a gesture of mounting frustration, then suddenly snaps his eyes open with renewed determination. RANDAL has a heart-to-heart with VERONICA, DANTE's ex-girlfriend known for her fiery personality, who stares dumbfounded by RANDAL's unexpected sincerity before exiting. DANTE lies alone on the floor of the shop, overwhelmed by the day's events, as RANDAL exits and locks the door behind him, securing the store for the night. Close-up on RANDAL's face as he steps inside, hands clasp around his throat in mock desperation, and DANTE yanks him out of the frame, throttling RANDAL and choking him to the ground in a playful scuffle. RANDAL throws his fists into DANTE's midriff, sending him back into the magazine rack holding an eclectic mix of periodicals. RANDAL jumps to his feet as DANTE comes at him again, causing RANDAL to tumble into cakes prominently displaying Entenmann's branding, as Entenmann's products scatter around him. He grabs a pound cake, famous for its rich sweetness, and hits DANTE in the head with it, using the opportunity to scurry down the middle aisle, cluttered with discounted snacks. RANDAL grabs an Italian bread, known for its crusty exterior, and smacks it into DANTE's face as DANTE rushes him blindly, the chaos and laughter echoing in the small store.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: JAY deals with a customer as SILENT BOB looks on and the two exit. DANTE alone studies his summons and rubs his forehead then spins angrily before his expression softens. DANTE hops behind the counter as a customer pays for something while he continues to talk. Another customer and then yet another approach the counter. JAY and SILENT BOB lean against the wall as a woman kisses DANTE's forehead and walks away heading toward the back. DANTE watches her leave then looks ahead dreamily halfspinning in his chair before exploding in jubilance. RANDAL enters carrying videos and DANTE hands him the summons which RANDAL reads. The cooler door is heard opening as DANTE and RANDAL regard a woman curiously. she looks very satisfied. CAITLIN walks lazily down the convenience store aisle and DANTE is bewildered as she joins them latching onto DANTE's arm lovingly. RANDAL and DANTE stare at CAITLIN confused and everyone is silent. The same OLD MAN who took a porn mag to the bathroom is now serene almost happy as he lies on a stretcher. The body bag zipper is pulled closed as DANTE the CORONER and RANDAL stand around the stretcherbound body bag. Midway down the body bag something protrudes pushing it up indicating an erection. The CORONER takes notes while RANDAL stares at it. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. Ambulance attendants join them and the stretcher is wheeled out. The CORONER stares at DANTE while RANDAL and the CORONER stare in disbelief. RANDAL looks down anonymously and DANTE and RANDAL stare at the floor both saying nothing. RANDAL hops off the freezer case and exits later returning as DANTE crosses out of the scene. DANTE repairs ripped dollar bills by taping them back together. JAY enters with SILENT BOB and claps his hands then exits leaving SILENT BOB standing there until he also leaves. DANTE shuts his eyes tightly and rubs the bridge of his nose with his thumb and forefinger in deep concentration then suddenly snaps his eyes open. RANDAL has a hearttoheart with VERONICA who stares dumbfounded before exiting. DANTE lies alone on the floor as RANDAL exits and locks the door behind him. Closeup on RANDAL's face as he steps inside. hands clasp around his throat and DANTE yanks him out of the frame throttling RANDAL and choking him to the ground. RANDAL throws his fists into DANTE's midriff sending him back into the magazine rack. RANDAL jumps to his feet as DANTE comes at him again causing RANDAL to tumble into cakes as Entenmann's products scatter around him. He grabs a pound cake and hits DANTE in the head with it using the opportunity to scurry down the middle aisle. RANDAL grabs Italian bread and smacks it into DANTE's face as DANTE rushes him blindly.

test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: JAY deals with a customer as a dog looks on, and the two exit. A squirrel, alone, studies his summons and rubs his forehead, then spins angrily before his expression softens. The squirrel hops behind the counter as a customer pays for something while the squirrel continues to talk. Another customer and then yet another approach the counter. JAY and a dog lean against the wall as a cat kisses the squirrel's forehead and walks away, heading toward the back. The squirrel watches her leave, then looks ahead dreamily, half-spinning in his chair before exploding in jubilance. A rabbit enters carrying videos, and the squirrel hands him the summons, which the rabbit reads. The cooler door is heard opening as the squirrel and the rabbit regard a woman curiously; she looks very satisfied. A turtle walks lazily down the convenience store aisle, and the squirrel is bewildered as she joins them, latching onto the squirrel's arm lovingly. The rabbit and the squirrel stare at the turtle, confused, and everyone is silent. The same old tree who took a porn mag to the bathroom is now serene, almost happy, as it lies on a stretcher. The body bag zipper is pulled closed as the squirrel, the coroner, and the rabbit stand around the stretcher-bound body bag. Midway down the body bag, something protrudes, pushing it up, indicating an erection. The coroner takes notes while the rabbit stares at it. Ambulance attendants join them, and the stretcher is wheeled out. The coroner stares at the squirrel, while the rabbit and the coroner stare in disbelief. The rabbit looks down, anonymously, and the squirrel and the rabbit stare at the floor, both saying nothing. The rabbit hops off the freezer case and exits, later returning as the squirrel crosses out of the scene. The squirrel repairs ripped dollar bills by taping them back together. JAY enters with a dog and claps his hands, then exits, leaving the dog standing there until he also leaves. The squirrel shuts his eyes tightly and rubs the bridge of his nose with his thumb and forefinger in deep concentration, then suddenly snaps his eyes open. The rabbit has a heart-to-heart with a butterfly, who stares dumbfounded before exiting. The squirrel lies alone on the floor as the rabbit exits and locks the door behind him. Close-up on the rabbit's face as he steps inside, hands clasp around his throat, and the squirrel yanks him out of the frame, throttling the rabbit and choking him to the ground. The rabbit throws his fists into the squirrel's midriff, sending him back into the magazine rack. The rabbit jumps to his feet as the squirrel comes at him again, causing the rabbit to tumble into cakes as Entenmann's products scatter around him. He grabs a pound cake and hits the squirrel in the head with it, using the opportunity to scurry down the middle aisle. The rabbit grabs Italian bread and smacks it into the squirrel's face as the squirrel rushes him blindly.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: JAY deals with a customer as SILENT BOB looks on, and the two exit. DANTE, alone, studies his blueprint and rubs his chin, then spins angrily before his expression softens. DANTE hops behind the display case as a customer pays for something while he continues to talk. Another customer and then yet another approach the display case. JAY and SILENT BOB lean against the bookshelf as a woman kisses DANTE's chin and walks away, heading toward the front. DANTE watches her leave, then looks ahead dreamily, half-spinning in his swivel chair before exploding in jubilance. RANDAL enters carrying newspapers, and DANTE hands him the blueprint, which RANDAL reads. The fridge door is heard opening as DANTE and RANDAL regard a woman curiously; she looks very content. CAITLIN walks lazily down the shoe store aisle, and DANTE is bewildered as she joins them, latching onto DANTE's arm lovingly. RANDAL and DANTE stare at CAITLIN, confused, and everyone is silent. The same OLD MAN who took a comic book to the restroom is now serene, almost happy, as he lies on a hammock. The tarp zipper is pulled closed as DANTE, the PARAMEDIC, and RANDAL stand around the hammock-bound tarp. Midway down the tarp, something protrudes, pushing it up, indicating an erection. The PARAMEDIC takes notes while RANDAL stares at it. Emergency crew members join them, and the hammock is wheeled out. The PARAMEDIC stares at DANTE, while RANDAL and the PARAMEDIC stare in disbelief. RANDAL looks down, anonymously, and DANTE and RANDAL stare at the carpet, both saying nothing. RANDAL hops off the counter and exits, later returning as DANTE crosses out of the scene. DANTE repairs torn lottery tickets by taping them back together. JAY enters with SILENT BOB and claps his hands, then exits, leaving SILENT BOB standing there until he also leaves. DANTE shuts his eyes tightly and rubs the bridge of his nose with his palm in deep concentration, then suddenly snaps his eyes open. RANDAL has a heart-to-heart with VERONICA, who stares dumbfounded before exiting. DANTE lies alone on the table as RANDAL exits and locks the door behind him. Close-up on RANDAL's face as he steps inside, hands clasp around his wrist, and DANTE yanks him out of the frame, throttling RANDAL and choking him to the ground. RANDAL throws his fists into DANTE's chest, sending him back into the comic rack. RANDAL jumps to his feet as DANTE comes at him again, causing RANDAL to tumble into pastries as donut products scatter around him. He grabs a loaf of sourdough and hits DANTE in the head with it, using the opportunity to scurry down the back aisle. RANDAL grabs a baguette and smacks it into DANTE's face as DANTE rushes him blindly.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: JAY negotiates with a customer as SILENT BOB nods intermittently, and the two meander away. DANTE, alone, glances at his summons and scratches his chin, then twirls anxiously before his expression relaxes. DANTE crouches behind the counter as a customer inspects something while he continues to chat. Another customer and then yet another wander toward the counter. JAY and SILENT BOB rest against the wall as a woman pats DANTE's forehead and strolls away, heading toward the back. DANTE observes her departure, then gazes forward dreamily, half-sliding in his chair before bursting into laughter. RANDAL arrives holding videos, and DANTE tosses him the summons, which RANDAL examines. The cooler door is heard creaking open as DANTE and RANDAL observe a woman curiously; she looks very content. CAITLIN saunters lazily down the convenience store aisle, and DANTE is perplexed as she joins them, clinging onto DANTE's arm affectionately. RANDAL and DANTE gaze at CAITLIN, puzzled, and everyone remains mute. The same OLD MAN who examined a porn mag in the bathroom is now calm, almost delighted, as he stretches out on a stretcher. The body bag zipper is tugged shut as DANTE, the CORONER, and RANDAL circle the stretcher-bound body bag. Midway down the body bag, something juts out, raising it, indicating an erection. The CORONER scribbles notes while RANDAL gapes at it. Ambulance attendants assemble around them, and the stretcher is rolled away. The CORONER peers at DANTE, while RANDAL and the CORONER glance in disbelief. RANDAL looks down, nonchalantly, and DANTE and RANDAL gaze at the floor, both remaining silent. RANDAL hops off the freezer case and departs, later returning as DANTE drifts out of the scene. DANTE stitches torn dollar bills by stapling them back together. JAY enters with SILENT BOB and snaps his fingers, then departs, leaving SILENT BOB lingering until he also departs. DANTE closes his eyes tightly and taps the bridge of his nose with his thumb and forefinger in intense focus, then suddenly widens his eyes. RANDAL shares a laugh with VERONICA, who blinks vacantly before leaving. DANTE lounges alone on the floor as RANDAL exits and bolts the door behind him. Close-up on RANDAL's face as he tiptoes inside, hands pressed against his cheeks, and DANTE tugs him out of the frame, nudging RANDAL and shoving him to the ground. RANDAL sways his fists into DANTE's midsection, propelling him back into the magazine rack. RANDAL springs to his feet as DANTE advances at him again, causing RANDAL to stumble into cakes as Entenmann's products cascade around him. He seizes a pound cake and nudges DANTE in the head with it, seizing the opportunity to scamper down the middle aisle. RANDAL snatches Italian bread and nudges it into DANTE's face as DANTE barrels toward him blindly.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: JUPITER negotiates with an astronaut as QUIET NED observes, and the pair depart. MARCO, by himself, examines his homework and massages his temple, then twirls furiously before his demeanor softens. MARCO springs behind the sofa as an astronaut purchases something while he continues to speak. Another astronaut and then yet another approach the sofa. JUPITER and QUIET NED lean against the bookshelf as a mime pecks MARCO's temple and strolls away, heading toward the attic. MARCO watches the mime depart, then gazes forward dreamily, half-spinning in his hammock before bursting with elation. RONALD enters holding manuscripts, and MARCO hands him the homework, which RONALD inspects. The microwave door is heard opening as MARCO and RONALD regard a mime curiously; she appears very content. CLARA ambles lazily down the library aisle, and MARCO is puzzled as she unites with them, clinging to MARCO's arm affectionately. RONALD and MARCO gaze at CLARA, perplexed, and everyone is silent. The identical OLD CAT who took a comic book to the garden is now tranquil, nearly gleeful, as it reclines on a hammock. The trumpet case zipper is pulled closed as MARCO, the SCIENTIST, and RONALD stand around the hammock-bound trumpet case. Midway down the trumpet case, something juts out, lifting it, signifying a protrusion. The SCIENTIST jots notes while RONALD gawks at it. Delivery drivers join them, and the hammock is wheeled out. The SCIENTIST glances at MARCO, while RONALD and the SCIENTIST gaze in shock. RONALD glances downward, anonymously, and MARCO and RONALD fixate on the carpet, both remaining silent. RONALD hops off the picnic table and exits, later returning as MARCO moves out of the frame. MARCO mends torn postcards by taping them back together. JUPITER enters with QUIET NED and claps his hands, then departs, leaving QUIET NED standing there until he also departs. MARCO shuts his eyes firmly and massages the bridge of his nose with his thumb and forefinger in deep reflection, then abruptly pops his eyes open. RONALD shares a heartfelt moment with ISABEL, who gazes bewildered before departing. MARCO lies alone on the carpet as RONALD departs and latches the door behind him. Close-up on RONALD's expression as he steps inside, hands clutch around his jacket, and MARCO yanks him out of the frame, strangling RONALD and pinning him to the ground. RONALD drives his elbows into MARCO's abdomen, pushing him back into the bookshelf. RONALD leaps to his feet as MARCO charges at him again, causing RONALD to tumble into pastries as cupcakes scatter around him. He seizes a sponge cake and strikes MARCO on the forehead with it, utilizing the moment to scurry down the central aisle. RONALD grabs rye bread and slaps it into MARCO's forehead as MARCO lunges at him blindly.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: LUCY negotiates with a vendor as QUIET JIM observes, and the duo vanishes. VICTOR, solitary, examines his notebook and massages his temples, then twirls furiously before his demeanor lightens. VICTOR skips behind the register as a shopper buys something while he ceaselessly converses. Another shopper and then a different one approach the register. LUCY and QUIET JIM recline against the entrance as a lady pecks VICTOR's temple and strides away, heading toward the rear. VICTOR watches her leave, then gazes ahead dreamily, half-twirling in his seat before bursting in elation. SAMUEL arrives bearing books, and VICTOR gives him the notebook, which SAMUEL peruses. The cooler door is heard swinging open as VICTOR and SAMUEL eye a lady curiously; she seems very pleased. MOLLY strolls lazily down the supermarket aisle, and VICTOR is puzzled as she joins them, clinging to VICTOR's arm amiably. SAMUEL and VICTOR gawp at MOLLY, perplexed, and everyone is quiet. The identical OLD WOMAN who took a comic book to the restroom is now tranquil, almost content, as she rests on a stretcher. The body bag zipper is sealed shut as VICTOR, the TECHNICIAN, and SAMUEL stand around the stretcher-bound body bag. Midway down the body bag, something protrudes, lifting it, indicating a curvature. The TECHNICIAN scribbles notes while SAMUEL gapes at it. Medical staff join them, and the stretcher is rolled out. The TECHNICIAN gazes at VICTOR, while SAMUEL and the TECHNICIAN gaze in disbelief. SAMUEL glances down, inconspicuously, and VICTOR and SAMUEL gaze at the floor, both remaining silent. SAMUEL leaps off the refrigeration unit and leaves, later reappearing as VICTOR strides out of the scene. VICTOR mends torn euro notes by pasting them back together. LUCY enters with QUIET JIM and snaps her fingers, then departs, leaving QUIET JIM standing until he also departs. VICTOR squeezes his eyes shut and massages the arch of his nose with his thumb and finger in deep focus, then abruptly springs his eyes open. SAMUEL has a heartfelt discussion with LEAH, who gapes stunned before leaving. VICTOR lies alone on the ground as SAMUEL departs and bolts the door behind him. Close-up on SAMUEL's face as he steps inside, hands wrap around his neck, and VICTOR pulls him out of the frame, throttling SAMUEL and pushing him to the ground. SAMUEL pounds his fists into VICTOR's abdomen, propelling him back into the candy display. SAMUEL bounds to his feet as VICTOR charges at him again, causing SAMUEL to stumble into pastries as Entenmann's goods scatter around him. He seizes a muffin and strikes VICTOR on the head with it, using the chance to dash down the center aisle. SAMUEL snatches French bread and smacks it into VICTOR's face as VICTOR charges him blindly.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: JAY negotiates with a spectator as SILENT BOB observes silently, and the pair depart. DANTE, solitary, examines his recipe and scratches his chin, then twirls irritably before his demeanor calms. DANTE leaps over the stand as a patron hands over an item while he continues to chat. Another patron and then one more approach the stand. JAY and SILENT BOB recline against the fence as a woman pats DANTE's shoulder and strolls away, moving toward the garden. DANTE watches her depart, then gazes forward wistfully, half-twirling in his chair before bursting into exhilaration. RANDAL arrives carrying newspapers, and DANTE gives him the recipe, which RANDAL examines. The pantry door is heard opening as DANTE and RANDAL observe a woman curiously; she appears very content. CAITLIN saunters lazily down the bookstore aisle, and DANTE is puzzled as she joins them, clinging to DANTE's hand fondly. RANDAL and DANTE gaze at CAITLIN, bewildered, and everyone is quiet. The same OLD MAN who borrowed a crossword puzzle to the lounge is now calm, almost cheerful, as he sprawls on a cot. The envelope flap is sealed as DANTE, the COACH, and RANDAL stand around the cot-bound envelope. Midway down the envelope, something bulges, lifting it, suggesting a surprise. The COACH scribbles notes while RANDAL gazes at it. Paramedics join them, and the cot is wheeled away. The COACH glances at DANTE, while RANDAL and the COACH stare in astonishment. RANDAL looks away, discreetly, and DANTE and RANDAL gaze at the ceiling, both remaining silent. RANDAL slides off the sofa case and leaves, later returning as DANTE steps out of the scene. DANTE mends torn pages by gluing them back together. JAY enters with SILENT BOB and snaps his fingers, then departs, leaving SILENT BOB standing there until he also departs. DANTE squeezes his eyes shut and massages his temples with his thumb and forefinger in intense focus, then suddenly pops his eyes open. RANDAL has a candid chat with VERONICA, who stares astonished before leaving. DANTE rests alone on the carpet as RANDAL exits and locks the door behind him. Close-up on RANDAL's face as he steps outside, hands grip his wrist, and DANTE pulls him out of the outline, pinching RANDAL and shoving him to the ground. RANDAL pushes his palms into DANTE's chest, sending him back into the flower stall. RANDAL leaps to his feet as DANTE charges at him again, causing RANDAL to topple into muffins as pastries scatter around him. He grabs a doughnut and taps DANTE on the arm with it, using the opportunity to dart down the hallway. RANDAL grabs a baguette and jabs it into DANTE's cheek as DANTE rushes him blindly.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: SAM negotiates with a squirrel as QUIET TOM observes, and the pair saunter out. BROOKE, by herself, examines her postcard and pats her cheek, then twirls furiously before her demeanor calms. BROOKE skips behind the bookshelf as a giraffe donates for a hat while she keeps chatting. A rabbit and then another bear wander toward the bookshelf. SAM and QUIET TOM lounge on the bench as a traveler pecks BROOKE's cheek and strolls off, aiming toward the woods. BROOKE gazes after her, then peers forward wistfully, half-spinning in her stool before bursting in joy. LUCAS arrives carrying books, and BROOKE gives him the postcard, which LUCAS examines. The closet handle is heard turning as BROOKE and LUCAS consider a fox curiously; she appears quite content. AMY saunters leisurely along the grocery aisle, and BROOKE is perplexed as she joins them, clinging to BROOKE's elbow affectionately. LUCAS and BROOKE gape at AMY, baffled, and silence ensues. The same OLD WIZARD who grabbed a novel to the basement is now tranquil, almost merry, as he reclines on a hammock. The sleeping bag zipper is pulled closed as BROOKE, the MEDIC, and LUCAS gather around the hammock-bound sleeping bag. Halfway down the sleeping bag, something juts, lifting it, signifying a bulge. The MEDIC jots notes while LUCAS gawks at it. Paramedics join them, and the hammock is wheeled away. The MEDIC glares at BROOKE, while LUCAS and the MEDIC gape in astonishment. LUCAS peers down, anonymously, and BROOKE and LUCAS scrutinize the ground, both voicing silence. LUCAS leaps off the cooler lid and meanders out, later reappearing as BROOKE walks out of view. BROOKE mends torn pieces of fabric by stitching them back together. SAM arrives with QUIET TOM and snaps his fingers, then departs, leaving QUIET TOM lingering until he, too, withdraws. BROOKE squeezes her eyes shut and massages the bridge of her nose with her knuckle and ring finger in deep thought, then abruptly pops her eyes open. LUCAS shares a heart-to-heart with NINA, who gawks speechlessly before walking away. BROOKE sprawls alone on the tiles as LUCAS exits and latches the gate behind him. Close-up on LUCAS's face as he slips inside, hands wrap around his necklace, and BROOKE drags him out of the frame, grappling LUCAS and pinning him to the ground. LUCAS hurls his elbows into BROOKE's stomach, sending him backward into the flower stand. LUCAS leaps upright as BROOKE charges at him again, causing LUCAS to tumble into pastries as muffin packets scatter around him. He seizes a croissant and bops BROOKE on the head with it, seizing the moment to dash down the central aisle. LUCAS grabs French loaf and slaps it across BROOKE's nose as BROOKE charges him blindly.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: JAY deals with a customer as SILENT BOB observes, and they exit. DANTE, alone, studies his summons, then serves customers. JAY and SILENT BOB lean on a wall as a woman kisses DANTE and leaves. DANTE is elated, but RANDAL arrives with videos, reads the summons, and they notice a satisfied woman. CAITLIN joins them, clinging to DANTE, leaving him and RANDAL puzzled. An OLD MAN is wheeled out serenely in a body bag with an apparent erection, shocking DANTE, RANDAL, and the CORONER. Afterward, DANTE repairs dollar bills and JAY exits with SILENT BOB. DANTE focuses, then snaps his eyes open. RANDAL talks with VERONICA, who leaves shocked. Alone, DANTE is attacked by RANDAL in a physical scuffle, leading to a chaotic altercation with scattered cakes and Italian bread until RANDAL escapes.
